short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type your search query, hit enter, get the best result from YouTube. Want to see the search results? Simply click the search button.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simply The Best for YouTube is a seamless browser add-on designed to enhance your YouTube search experience. With this extension installed, users can swiftly navigate to the top search result on YouTube by simply pressing the "Enter" key after typing their query. This eliminates the need to scroll through search results, offering a direct pathway to the most relevant content. For those who prefer to view the entire search results page, they can do so by clicking the search button, ensuring that the traditional search experience remains intact.

If you find value in this extension and wish to support the development of more Simply The Best extensions, consider making a donation. Every contribution, big or small, is greatly appreciated.
